dataTemplate.name: XXIEPRGT
dataTemplate.description: OD: Purged Un-submitted ER for Terminated Employees

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT employee_name AS "EMPLOYEE_NAME" ,approver_name AS "APPROVER_NAME" ,report_no AS "REPORT_NO" ,report_status AS "REPORT_STATUS" ,NVL(sum(personal_txn_amt),0) AS "PERSONAL_TXN" ,NVL(sum(business_txn_amt),0) AS "BUSINESS_TXN" ,nvl(sum(cash_txn_amt),0) AS "CASH_TXN" ,(NVL(SUM(personal_txn_amt),0)+NVL(SUM(business_txn_amt),0)+NVL(SUM(cash_txn_amt),0)) AS "TOTAL" FROM xx_iexp_purge_txns WHERE request_id=:P_REQUEST_ID GROUP BY employee_name,approver_name,report_no,report_status ORDER BY employee_name,report_no
